statements: DELETE FROM ForestCoverChanges WHERE region_name = 'Amazon' AND year = 2020;
DELETE FROM ForestCoverChanges WHERE id = 5 AND region_name = 'Amazon' AND year = 2022;
DELETE FROM ForestCoverChanges WHERE forest_type = 'Deciduous Forest' AND forest_area_km2 > 10000;
DELETE FROM ForestCover WHERE forest_id = 100 AND tree_species = 'Oak';
DELETE FROM ReforestationProjects WHERE project_id = 500 AND success_rate > 70.00;
DELETE FROM forest_monitoring WHERE project_id = (SELECT project_id FROM reforestation_projects WHERE location = 'Northern Forest' ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 1);
DELETE FROM MonitoringData WHERE area_name = 'Amazon Rainforest';
DELETE FROM ForestRegion WHERE region_name = 'Amazon Rainforest';
